data.title: Textpattern CMS support forum
data.meta_description: The official support and discussion forum for Textpattern CMS, moderated and curated by the Textpattern community.
data.text:
1

Official announcements

Announcements from Team Textpattern. (RSS)

Related: Textpattern blog

(Moderated by Bloke, colak, etc, gaekwad, jakob, philwareham, wet)

92 1,075 2024-08-11 17:56:59 by gaekwad

2

Core development

Discussion around current and future development of Textpattern. (RSS)

Related: Textpattern @ GitHub, Textpattern issue tracker @ GitHub

(Moderated by Bloke, colak, Dragondz, els, etc, gaekwad, jakob, jstubbs, michaelkpate, philwareham, rsilletti, uli, wet)
